data.message: Saarim Siddiqui Rohaan Saeed Look how much hes changed! I dont blame him about why he stopped rapping. What he basically means is that rap has changed these days and isnt how good it was before. Tbh todays rappers just give a bad name to Rap. They always talk about drugs and money while Eminem would narrate real life stories! His Rap was inspirational! Hopefully he will make one last song!

replies.message: Nope. Just listen to someone like Watsky man. Deep shit no drugs no "street rapper"
I dont mean all rappers. There are alot of good rappers out there like Logic and the one you named. I wasnt talking about all only a few
